snippet.title: Songs of Silence - Official Ehrengard Faction Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Learn about the Ehrengard of the 1000 Kingdoms, a playable faction available in the upcoming fantasy 4x strategy game, Songs of Silence. Meet the young Queen Lorelai, get a deeper look at her background, story, and connection to an ally named Hauser, and the units you'll find in this faction. In Songs of Silence, manage kingdoms and command their armies as you explore a world divided by conflict and sundered into realms of light and darkness. Songs of Silence will be available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S, and a Kickstarter campaign is available now.
